title: Marvell to acquire Celestial AI for as much as $5.5 billion
description: The deal is an aggressive move for Marvell to acquire complimentary technology to its semiconductor networking business.
content:
Semiconductor company Marvell on Tuesday announced that it will acquire Celestial AI for at least $3.25 billion in cash and stock.
The purchase price could increase to $5.5 billion if Celestial hits… [+2957 chars]
